Translation.String: Enhance your city's visuals with this beginner-friendly visual customization tool.
In this section you can change several world-related settings such as Time of Day, latitude, longitude and sun and ambient light intensity.
In this section you can change several weather-related settings such as rain, snow and fog intensity.
In this section you can quickly change the LUT you want to use.
In this section you can save your current settings as a Preset, load previously saved Presets, or reset everything to default.
